channel.title: Bitmap Calculator by Yakman
channel.description:
I saw a Form Calculator and that inspired me, however i have no idea how to make forms, but i am good at fastdrawing (even though i say so myself),
so here it is, Atari-Style bitmap Calculator by Yakman :cool:
[IMG]http://img53.imageshack.us/img53/435/bitmapcalculatorvz6.png[/img] How to use: Easy, click the buttons
Enjoy!! ;D
note: to close the Calculator, press the green/white x in the top-right corner :rolleyes:

item.title: Bitmap Calculator by Yakman
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

what are these other calculators baised on, i only saw a form calculator by bego on SRL forums, then someone challanged me to match it with a fastdrawing baised one

i am going to update this when i get really bored one day, like ill make a grey outline along the buttons which dissapears as you press them to make an illution of being depressed, also ill add things like pi, sine, cosine, and tangent

also if you look on line 14 and 15, there are constants which allow you to change the color scheme, i chose green and black as default because of its Atari looks

Read full topic
